conda install pytorch installs an old version of PyTorch that the anaconda team checked-in. you need to use conda install pytorch -c soumith ... the command from our website.

torch is a separate product from pytorch, pytorch has no depedency on torch. we are not going to add any details of installing it on the pytorch website. Right now torch can be installed from source using the page you pointed out, the install is a bit clunky with a shell script, no way around it.

body:
`conda install pytorch` installs an old version of PyTorch that the anaconda team checked-in. you need to use `conda install pytorch -c soumith ...` the command from our website.

torch is a separate product from pytorch, pytorch has no depedency on torch. we are not going to add any details of installing it on the pytorch website. Right now torch can be installed from source using the page you pointed out, the install is a bit clunky with a shell script, no way around it.
